main_definition: Roles refer to the functions or parts that a person or thing plays in a particular situation, event, story, system, etc.

meanings_and_examples.example: In our family, my role is to take care of the groceries and household chores.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Character or part played by an actor in a movie, play, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The lead actress had the most captivating role as a warrior queen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person's position or status within a group or organization
meanings_and_examples.example: As a team leader, my role is to ensure everyone works together effectively towards our common goals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The function of an object in relation to other objects and its environment
meanings_and_examples.example: In the ecosystem, bees have different roles: pollinators, producers (by collecting nectar), or decomposers (in some cases).

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of predefined functions that a program uses
meanings_and_examples.example: In computer programming, the role of this function is to calculate the sum of an array.
